name: ListAllOrganizationUsers
description:
Retrieve all users in the organization including inactive ones.

Use this tool to get a complete list of users within the organization, covering active, deactivated, and unverified accounts.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Specifies the number of users to be returned in a single page. The maximum value allowed is 100.

value_schema.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: The specific page number of users to return. Use for pagination.

parameters.name: order_users_by
parameters.description: Specify the user attribute to order results by. Options include `name`, `modified_at`, and `user_count`. Use a negative sign for descending order, e.g., `-name`.

value_schema.description:
User attribute to order results by. Sort order is ascending by default.
Sort order is descending if the field
is prefixed by a negative sign, for example `sort=-name`. Options: `name`,
`modified_at`, `user_count`.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Direction of sort for user listing. Options: 'asc' for ascending, 'desc' for descending.

parameters.name: user_filter_string
parameters.description: String to filter users by. Defaults to no filtering if blank or omitted.

value_schema.description: Filter all users by the given string. Defaults to no filtering.

parameters.name: user_status_filter
parameters.description: Filter users by status. Comma separated values: `Active`, `Pending`, `Disabled`. Defaults to no filtering.

value_schema.description:
Filter on status attribute.
Comma separated list, with possible values `Active`, `Pending`, and `Disabled`.
Defaults to no filtering.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.description: Size for a given page. The maximum allowed value is 100.

`modified_at`, `user_count`.

parameters.description: Filter all users by the given string. Defaults to no filtering.

value_schema.description: Filter all users by the given string. Defaults to no filtering.

parameters.description:
Filter on status attribute.
Comma separated list, with possible values `Active`, `Pending`, and `Disabled`.
